title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 407.10 - Amendments to the plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 407.10 - Amendments to the plan

State Regulations
A social services district may propose amendments to the
plan at any time. If a reduction in services, a change in eligibility, or a
change in fees is proposed, the amendment must be published for public comment
and be presented to the local advisory council for review, prior to submission
to the department. If an amendment is approved by the department, it becomes
effective on the date so designated by the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
407.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
